name: American Treacle
description: Cider, molasses, and Denizen Rum make for an autumnal cocktail that's got the spicy-apple notes of an apple pie without the excessive sweetness.

recipeInstructions.text: For syrup, bring water, sugar, and cinnamon sticks to a boil, stirring until sugar fully dissolves. Let cool. Strain before using.
Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add rum, molasses, cinnamon demerara syrup, Angostura, and baked apple bitters. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
